pageSubtitle: Vault is an identity-based secret and encryption management system. This documentation covers the main concepts of Vault, what problems it can solve, and contains a quick start for using Vault.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Secrets Management
marketingContentBlocks.description: Centrally store, access, and deploy secrets across applications, systems, and infrastructure.

cards.description: A generic Key-Value store used to store arbitrary secrets within the configured physical storage for Vault.

cards.description: Generate database credentials dynamically based on configured roles.
cards.title: Database Credentials

cards.description: Deploy Vault into Kubernetes using the official HashiCorp Vault Helm chart.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Encryption Services
marketingContentBlocks.description: Securely handle data such as social security numbers, credit card numbers, and other types of compliance-regulated information.

cards.description: Apply cryptographic functions on data in-transit. Sign and verify data, generate hashes and HMACs of data, and act as a source of random bytes.
cards.title: Transit Secrets Engine

cards.description: Handle secure data transformation and tokenization against a provided input value using NIST vetted cryptographic standards and other transformations such as masking.
cards.title: Transform Secrets Engine

cards.description: Exchange a sensitive value for an unrelated value called a token. The original sensitive value cannot be recovered from a token alone but is irreversible.
cards.title: Tokenization

marketingContentBlocks.title: Key Management
marketingContentBlocks.description: Use a standardized workflow for distribution and lifecycle management of cryptographic keys in various KMS providers.

cards.description: Act as a key management interoperability protocol server provider and handle the lifecycle of its KMIP managed objects.

cards.description: A consistent workflow for distribution and lifecycle management of cryptographic keys in key management service (KMS) providers.
cards.title: Key Management Secrets Engine
